author: wsjcom
title: Christians Of Conscience Must Vote for the Least Bad
text:
In “‘Evangelical’ Isn’t a Dirty Word” (Houses of Worship, Feb. 2), David Skeel addresses the paradox of evangelical Christians voting for individuals whose personal behavior doesn’t reflect the values of Christianity.
He Quote: s an evangelical writer, Jen Hatmaker, who, in a comment to the Washington Post, said that many evangelicals were “distancing ourselves to protect our consciences.”
The...
